remarks: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
rblem1.1 $e |- ( -. ph \/ ps ) $.
rblem1.2 $e |- ( -. ch \/ th ) $.
rblem1 $p |- ( -. ( ph \/ ch ) \/ ( ps \/ th ) ) $.
